message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob! I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $85. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $82.50. Can you consider that?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $84. What do you think?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I was thinking more like $82. I'm willing to meet you halfway from there. Can you meet me at $82?
I'm getting close to accepting too, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway from $82 and offer it to you for $83. What do you think?
I think we're really close now, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $83, so I'll offer $81.50. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting a bit hesitant to go any lower, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from $81.50 and offer it to you for $82.25. What do you think?

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back and forth, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $82.25, but I'm only willing to go up to $81. I'm not sure I want to spend any more time negotiating. Can you meet me at $81?
